thread.title: BRIEF-FinTech Acquisition Corp. II And Intermex Holdings II Announce Release Of Transaction And Business Updates

title: BRIEF-FinTech Acquisition Corp. II And Intermex Holdings II Announce Release Of Transaction And Business Updates
text: March 27, 2018 / 10:39 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-FinTech Acquisition Corp. II And Intermex Holdings II Announce Release Of Transaction And Business Updates Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 27 (Reuters) - Fintech Acquisition Corp Ii: * FINTECH ACQUISITION CORP. II AND INTERMEX HOLDINGS II, INC. ANNOUNCE RELEASE OF TRANSACTION AND BUSINESS UPDATES * FINTECH ACQUISITION CORP II - DEAL FOR ‍APPROXIMATELY $260 MILLION PLUS ASSUMPTION OF EXISTING INDEBTEDNESS​ * FINTECH ACQUISITION CORP II - FILED PRELIMINARY STATEMENT WITH U.S. SEC FOR SPECIAL SHAREHOLDER MEETING TO CONSIDER CO’S PENDING DEAL WITH INTERMEX * FINTECH ACQUISITION CORP II - FILED PRELIMINARY PROXY STATEMENT/PROSPECTUS WITH SEC FOR A SPECIAL MEETING TO CONSIDER FNTE’S INTERMEX​ DEAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
